EmailTemplate.description: Web Request NO active NavDB Service
EmailTemplate.name: Customer Web Access No Service
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell NAVDB - More information required {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We have received your request for NavDB Web access. We are unable to find any active databases subscription based on the information you provided in your request.
What type of information are you looking for on the website? If you would like to begin to receive Navigational Database service, please let us know and we can assist you further.
Thank you in advance for your prompt attention to this matter.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Data Services
Account Management Representative(AMR)
email: dsa@honeywell.com
602-436-6739
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
